joinNowPage.subTitle: MyACUVUE®
joinNowPage.body.paragraph1: Join MyACUVUE® and enjoy exclusive offers every time you purchase ACUVUE® contact lenses.
joinNowPage.body.paragraph2.third: (limit to 4 boxes per transaction). T&Cs apply.
registrationPage.validations.ageThreshol: MyACUVUE is only available for Indians aged 18 or above.
joinNowPage.TermsAndConditions.iHaveRead: I have read and accepted the Terms & Conditions. I further consent that my personal details collected (“personal information”), will be stored, processed, and utilized in accordance with the terms of the privacy policy
joinNowPage.TermsAndConditions.deletePer: I reserve the right to request for the deletion of my personal information so shared, by contacting the following email address: ra-jnjin-acuvue2@its.jnj.com
pointsTermsandCondition.info: I consent that the information as shared with J&J Vision, will be utilized he purposes of direct marketing, including updating me about relevant product updates. Such information may be stored in a location outside of India (in a manner consistent with Indian regulations). I understand that J&J Vision will retain my personal information, for above mentioned purposes (in compliance with applicable statute).
profilePage.registrationSuccessDialogBod: Thank you for registering with MyACUVUE®!
Enjoy exclusive offer, rewards and more every time you shop ACUVUE® Brand Contact Lenses.
dashboardPage.opticalStore.confirmationD: This optical store will be serving you for your MyACUVUE® services.
dashboardPage.opticalStore.successDialog: Your Optical store has been registered to your account!
dashboardPage.opticalStore.registerPrefe: Redeem your complimentary contact lens trial lenses and purchase offer codes at any of these participating optical store. Select your preferred optical store now
headerPage.membershipCard.rewardsDescrip: Get exciting offers & benefits on your purchase of Acuvue contact lenses
completeYourProfilePage.messaging: Your mobile number has been verified! Please enter your details to complete your profile and gain access to exclusive member benefits!
